articles.title: Stadia works just fine on iOS, even without a true native app - Engadget
articles.description: A big draw for video game streaming services is the ability to play on any device, any time.  Starting today, you can play any Google Stadia game on an iPhone or iPad.  The service is accessible through Chrome, Safari or a progressive web app (PWA).
